mbofilter.filtercondition: app=:app and DATAGROUP in (select DATAGROUP from MOBILEDATAGROUP where datatype in (select value from synonymdomain where domainid='MOBDATAGRPTYPE' and maxvalue='WORKSET') and app=:app) and groupname in (select groupname from groupuser where userid=:user)

app=:app and DATAGROUP in (select DATAGROUP from MOBILEDATAGROUP where datatype in (select value from synonymdomain where domainid='MOBDATAGRPTYPE' and maxvalue='ADDITIONAL') and app=:app) and groupname in (select groupname from groupuser where userid=:user)
personid = (select personid from maxuser where userid=:user) and isprimary=:yes
personid = (select personid from maxuser where userid=:user)
DOMAINID = 'CHANGEREASON' and siteid is null and orgid is null
DOMAINID = 'MOBFONTIMAGESIZE' and siteid is null and orgid is null

(touser=:user or exists (select 1 from groupuser where groupname=togroup and userid=:user)) and (onlymobileapp is null or onlymobileapp in (select value from synonymdomain where domainid='MOBILEAPPS' and maxvalue=:app))
